column5: Hey i have also been looking into getting a Vex but got to researching these 'new' systems called 'Showdown'. Anyone used them or heard about them....they are quite a bit cheaper ($250) and seem somewhat easier to get use to??? They are made by Naturevision (same company that makes Aqua-veiw). Any info or thoughts guys and gals???????  Thanks Brkygetr
Never heard of them - got a link?    Don
try this.....  http://www.naturevisioninc.com/shop_nvi/pr...p?productid=229  If that doesn't work just google 'showdown fishfinder'  Brkygetr
Hmmmm............. that looks kinda interesting!   Don

The grey bars look pretty thick,   not like the 3 or 5 colour light system that comes with the flashers.    I dont know for sure but because I havent seen them in action, but in my opinion nothing beats a good ole classic flasher
I see no reason to buy one it's  basically a LCD fishfinder with no history
It's been out for a couple of year. last year it was called the VPG I think. some people like it more than a flasher. For me nothing will replace my Vex.
Same as a flasher except not in a circular format,  fast return on the "image".
